question: Newly hatched turtles are easy prey for other animals. What is an important ability turtles have for better survival of their offspring?
candidate_answers: (A) to fight off predators (B) to produce a toxin that makes them taste bad (C) to lay hundreds of eggs so a few will survive (D) to dig a hole and hide from predators
answer: to produce a toxin that makes them taste bad
label: B
